name: LOPO
additional_notices: No active trades are found for this coin. Please submit a ticket at %{link} if you think this is an error.

The following token has a variable tax function on the smart contract to change tax rates post deployment.
Do your own research and be careful if you are trading this token.

description.en:
LOPO was born in November 2022.Our vision is to compress all crypto solutions into one platform. We will have our own LOPO CEX, LOPO DEX, LOPO Mobile Wallet Application, LOPO Staking Platform, LOPO Swap, and LOPO profit calculator.At the same time to have a decentralized asset on the blockchain be accessible not only to industry insiders but rather something that can be utilized by any user in the “real world”.
LOPO Network is a cutting-edge project that offers advanced crypto and DeFi portfolio management solutions.  Also, LOPO wallet is a highly secure wallet that provides users with a simple and convenient way to manage their digital assets.
By incorporating AI technology, LOPO Network aims to revolutionize the way individuals and institutions manage their crypto assets. With its intelligent algorithms, LOPO Network provides users with personalized and highly efficient portfolio management, maximizing returns while minimizing risk. 
The platform's AI-powered system is constantly learning and adapting, ensuring that users stay ahead of the curve in a constantly evolving crypto market. Get ready to experience the future of crypto portfolio management with LOPO Network.

description.hr:
LOPO was born in November 2022.Our vision is to compress all crypto solutions into one platform. We will have our own LOPO CEX, LOPO DEX, LOPO Mobile Wallet Application, LOPO Staking Platform, LOPO Swap, and LOPO profit calculator.At the same time to have a decentralized asset on the blockchain be accessible not only to industry insiders but rather something that can be utilized by any user in the “real world”.
LOPO Network is a cutting-edge project that offers advanced crypto and DeFi portfolio management solutions.  Also, LOPO wallet is a highly secure wallet that provides users with a simple and convenient way to manage their digital assets.
By incorporating AI technology, LOPO Network aims to revolutionize the way individuals and institutions manage their crypto assets. With its intelligent algorithms, LOPO Network provides users with personalized and highly efficient portfolio management, maximizing returns while minimizing risk. 
The platform's AI-powered system is constantly learning and adapting, ensuring that users stay ahead of the curve in a constantly evolving crypto market. Get ready to experience the future of crypto portfolio management with LOPO Network.
